required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Local Pharmacokinetics of Azithromycin Eye Drops in Healthy Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: Local Pharmacokinetics of Azithromycin Eye Drops in Healthy Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: To compare the pharmacokinetic behavior of azithromycin eye drops in the tear with the original azithromycin eye drops, and evaluate the release behavior of both in the eye.

detailed_description.textblock: There are 48 patients will divided into group A and group B randomly . subjects of Group A will given the first test drug, elution after the control drug; Subjects of Group B will given the first control drug, elution given to the test drug.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: There are 8 subjects will be enrolled in pre-test, each subject was sampled in two eyes and each subject participated in two cycles of the trial. 8 subjects, 16 eyes participated in the study, 32 samples of tears total . There are 48 subjects will divided into group A and group B randomly . subjects of Group A will given the first test drug, elution after the control drug; Subjects of Group B will given the first control drug, elution given to the test drug.

primary_outcome.time_frame: The tear samples were taken at 8 time points after administration,10 minutes,half hour,2 hours,4 hours,8 hours,12 hours,24 hours,36 hours
primary_outcome.description: The tear samples were taken at 8 time points after administration,10 minutes,half hour,2 hours,4 hours,8 hours,12 hours,24 hours,36 hours，The AUC of the test drug and the control drug was calculated at the average concentration of each point

secondary_outcome.time_frame: The tear samples were taken at 8 time points after administration,10 minutes,half hour,2 hours,4 hours,8 hours,12 hours,24 hours,36 hours
secondary_outcome.description: The tear samples were taken at 8 time points after administration,10 minutes,half hour,2 hours,4 hours,8 hours,12 hours,24 hours,36 hours，The Cmax of the test drug and the control drug was calculated at the average concentration of each point

secondary_outcome.time_frame: from the ICF signed to the end of the trial,through study completion, an average of 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: compared the laboratory test values before and after treatment,according to the study drug use, calculate the number of cases, the number of cases and the incidence of adverse reactions.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: from the ICF signed to the end of the trial,through study completion, an average of 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: Any serious adverse events that occur during the clinical study, whether or not related to the drug should be collected.

arm_group.description: In one cycle, give the azithromycin eye drops by essex,2.5ml/25mg，1 drop，once. In the second cycle(after 14 days elution）,give the AzaSite eye drops,2.5ml/25mg，1 drop，once.
In one cycle, give the AzaSite eye drops,2.5ml/25mg，1 drop，once. In the second cycle(after 14 days elution）,give the azithromycin eye drops by essex,2.5ml/25mg，1 drop，once.

intervention.description: azithromycin eye drops,2.5ml/25mg,by ZHUHAI ESSEX BIO-PHARMACEUTICAL),
azithromycin eye drops,2.5ml/25mg ,by Oak Pharmaceuticals, Inc subsidiary of Akorn, Inc

responsible_party.investigator_title: Director of Phase I Clinical Trial Center
